channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside elecricity sub station and brent garages on lincoln mews, 27th August
item.description:
Mixture of vegetation in bags and furniture/ rubbish This happens weekly, i live in Brands House You need to put a camera outside this area as people dump rubbish regularly

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple crashes as cars parked on corner due to sign vandalism, 27th August

item.title: Litter everywhere, 27th August
item.description:
The street is littered with waste like plastic bottles, food wrappers, commercial waste, and packaging . The items collect where the path meets the road and are scattered everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Station Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On 27/08/25 at 21:30pm there was a large group of black males and females in the range of about 60 or 70 more people on the streets and on the public grass smoking drugs drinking alcohol cars pulling up causing obstruction barbecues. Residence could not sleep with this antisocial behavior alcohol drug taking and loud music this is a regular occurrence on this stretch of Road at this location. Residence feel unsafe to go out of a night with this large group of black males it's quite intimidating can someone from Hackney Council please address this anti-social behavior criminal activity., 27th August
item.description:
There was a group of black ethnic males and females gathering drinking alcohol and taking drugs late at night and barbecues causing distress to residents. Large gathering of around 60 to 70 people.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bradstock Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside of royal mail, 27th August
item.description:
Spot used for fly tipping next the royal mail depot. Mostly random items, with a number of car parts and commercial waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41 - 43, Camberwell Station Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black pipe and broken boiler by 46 Waverley Road, 27th August
item.description:
Dear Street Clean Team, I would be grateful if you could pick up a Long black plastic pipe and broken boiler dumped by 46 Waverley Road - Bedford House, SE18 7TN. Thank you in advance. Kind regards, Nina

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waverley Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Hazelemere Rd - pedestrianised zone between Priory Park Rd and Glengall Rd (again), 27th August
item.description:
Fridge, suitcase and assorted junk. This is an almost daily occurrence at this now notorious fly-tipping site. Brent council - please restore the bollards to prevent cars/vans driving in to dump, fix the lighting and the overhanging trees, install some CCTV and please make this area a pleasant place to live again

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hazelmere Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Artificial light installed preventing sleep, 27th August
item.description:
A flat on Amhurst Park (estimated house number 75-69) has installed a very bright white light that shines out and directly into the back windows of flats on Cranwich Road. The light shines through the bedroom window and prevents sleep, causes headaches.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
